00039 #ifndef ORO_PROGRAM_EXCEPTIONS_HPP
00040 #define ORO_PROGRAM_EXCEPTIONS_HPP
00041 
00042 #include <exception>
00043 #include <string>
00044 #include "rtt-scripting-config.h"
00045 
00046 namespace RTT
00047 { namespace scripting {
00048 
00053     class RTT_SCRIPTING_API program_load_exception
00054         : public std::exception
00055     {
00056         std::string merror;
00057     public:
00058         program_load_exception( const std::string& error )
00059             : merror( error )
00060         {
00061         }
00062         ~program_load_exception() throw() {}
00063         const char* what() const throw()
00064         {
00065             return merror.c_str();
00066         }
00067     };
00068 
00073     class RTT_SCRIPTING_API program_unload_exception
00074         : public std::exception
00075     {
00076         std::string merror;
00077     public:
00078         program_unload_exception( const std::string& error )
00079             : merror( error )
00080         {
00081         }
00082         ~program_unload_exception() throw() {}
00083         const char* what() const throw()
00084         {
00085             return merror.c_str();
00086         }
00087     };
00088 }}
